title: Imagsa Tecnologies at Gulf Traffic 2015
text:
Imagsa Tecnologies at Gulf Traffic 2015 Thursday, September 10, 2015 by Imagsa Technologies Print Email 
From 7-9 December, Imagsa Technologies will be exhibiting at Gulf Traffic 2015, stand L31. 
This will be our second year of participation at Gulf Traffic. In this edition Imagsa will be introducing the new Atalaya 3D version 2.0, a high-performance stereoscopic ANPR camera using 270FPS and a full 2 Megapixel resolution sensor to simultaneously monitor 2 Lanes with a single camera. 
Additionally, Imagsa will be introducing the Chronos family of traffic control solutions, for red light enforcement, average speed enforcement, spot speed control, and access control. We also will be demonstrating new applications such as video-based classification, wrong-way detection, and detection of vehicles without license plates. Follow Us:
